interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Unaone Scalp Massager Shampoo Brush, Care Hair Brush with Soft Silicone Scalp Massager Wet and Dry Hair Scalp Brushes for Long Thick Curly Hair
Review Date: 2022/02/23
Store: Unaone
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Unaone', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Material': 'Silicone, Plastic', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 4 x 2 inches; 1.59 Ounces'}
Review Text: Good pair of silicone shampoo brushes. They have an included handle for hanging in the shower and ents to drain the excess water. Using it is more effective than fingertips especially in my daughter's hair as she finds the use of my fingers rough. Easy to wash and keep clean.
Review Title: shampoo brush
Rating: 5.0

Gel Nail Polish Kit with Gel Base and Top Coat, 12 Pcs All Seasons Skin Tones Pink Neutral Brown Gel Polish Kit, Soak Off LED Gel Nail Kit Manicure DIY Nail Art Home Salon
BEUXITUN
{'Brand': 'BEUXITUN', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '4.32 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '15', 'Liquid Volume': '0.33 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '8.5 x 4 x 3 inches; 1.35 Pounds'}
This is an ok gel polish. I got the gold and the silver and by themselves they don’t pop but I made a design with other colors and it looked good. It takes a few more dries under the light to cure. One bottle did come with the label upside down. It’s inexpensive and kinda feels it.
Ok
Lenaqueen Wig Caps for Making Wigs Open Wig Caps with PVC Paper for DIY Wigs Swiss Lace Wig Cap with Adjustable Strap for Weave Wig (Medium, Black)
Lenaqueen
{'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 1.18 x 0.39 inches; 0.42 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LNWIGCAP'}
This is a good quality wig cap that comes with 3 combs. It’s easy to fit on to the head and it feels comfortable. I plan to use this to make a weave and think it’s good quality for that.
Good quality
Lenaqueen Velvet Wig Grip Band Adjustable No Slip Wig Grip Headbands for Women Keep Wigs in Place Grip Wig Bands (Black)
Lenaqueen
{'Material': 'Velvet', 'Fabric Type': 'Velvet', 'Brand': 'Lenaqueen', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 1.18 x 0.39 inches; 0.32 Ounces'}
I’m new to wig grips but I really like them. I use this one on my headband wig in order to keep it from shifting on my head. It’s easy to put on and does not add a bulge to the wig.
Wig grip
O.M.CHIC Mannequin Head with shoulders for wig, Display wigs Eyeglasses Necklaces and Earrings
O.M.CHIC
{'Package Dimensions': '18.3 x 15.7 x 9 inches; 5.1 Pounds', 'UPC': '714676502699 714676502675'}
I really like this mannequin. It’s different to others that I’ve had. It is able to stand alone without the use of a tripod thanks to its base. Her make up is great for accentuating wigs or jewelry I want to display for sale. Her lips give a bit of attitude which I like. It’s good quality and I think well price.
Excellent quality

evpct
{'Product Dimensions': '6.85 x 5.28 x 0.63 inches; 4.66 Ounces'}
8 different colors and they are all amazing. My first time with different color eyeliners and I really like them. It’s waterproof and lasts a hood few hours. I unintentionally fell i asleep in the blue and it was a mess the day after but that’s to be expected. I wore to work (in a kitchen/chef duties) and it lasted, so it pretty good in my books.
Great combination and a fantastic price

I found this very good for wearing around the house during the day but not so good for sleeping, this is because it did not stay on. It kept sliding off. It is good for hair because of the satin insert and I quite like it for this. Stitching was good, no issues there.

profile:
**User Summary**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to show a strong passion for DIY beauty projects, particularly in gel nail care, wig-making, colorful eyeliners, and now incorporating hair care tools into their routine. Their recent interest in scalp massagers reflects a holistic approach, aiming to improve hair health and enhance the overall beauty experience.

- **Quality Expectations:** The user maintains a clear preference for non-toxic and cruelty-free products that prioritize hair health. Their emphasis on effective tools demonstrates a commitment to quality while balancing practicality in beauty items.

- **Aesthetics:** The user appreciates high-quality accessories that seamlessly blend function with aesthetics, as seen in their choices that reflect both vibrancy and style. The focus on both utility and design continues to influence their selections.

- **Performance Concerns:** The user values ease of use and performance in their beauty tools, as highlighted by their feedback on the effectiveness of manual versus tool-assisted applications. Their priority on practical, enjoyable experiences underscores this focus.

- **Pricing Sensitivity:** They remain budget-conscious, seeking quality items at reasonable prices. Their satisfaction with value and performance is evident in their evaluations.

- **Rating Behavior:** The user provides nuanced reviews, highlighting strengths and weaknesses with an experienced perspective. Their thorough evaluations reflect a desire for reliable, effective solutions in their beauty routine.

Overall, the user seeks versatile, ethical, and aesthetically pleasing beauty tools while upholding high standards for performance and value in their beauty journey.
